name: Micro Death Machines
description:
Created for the Scream Machine Game Jam (hosted by Caveware Digital) #ScreamMachine.  A GTA 2 like with a Zombie Apocalypse theme.  It features:

*  4 vehicle types - Front, rear and All wheel drive. Exhilarating drift mechanics.  Also features vehicular combat with cops in high speed pursuits.  Each type of car feels unique and requires a different play style.

*  Arcade like top down shooting.  Mouse precision aiming. Weapon types include guns, grenades and landmines 

* A City arena that feels alive with 12 different types of NPCs, which include Zombies, Pedestrians and Agents

* Hilarious Ragdoll physics - Mow down enemies with cars to see them fly.  Blast them to space with grenades and landmines.

* Tactical options due to survival element.  Conserve ammo by using other NPCs as Zombie bait.  Shoot landmine carrying characters to set up traps for Zombies. Roadkill = ammo, so go on a rampage with any vehicle.

* Enter and Exit any vehicle.

* Funny SFX and effects for total immersion. 

The game was created with the Unity Engine, using self made and free assets from the Unity store and Mixamo.com 

Windows PC Game, that supports a keyboard and Mouse.

Made by a single South African hobbyist developer over the Jam's 10 day period.
